description: Government EPC register API returns 503 error
fallback_action: Use cached EPC data from Land Registry
final_resolution: EPC verified from cached data (last sync 24hrs ago) - flagged for revalidation
demo_talking_points: System continues working even when external APIs fail

description: Experian AML check times out after 30 seconds
final_resolution: AML verified: PASS - certificate AML-2024-9008 issued

description: Rightmove rejects listing due to invalid postcode format
final_resolution: Listed successfully on Rightmove after format correction

description: Zoopla API rate limit exceeded during bulk upload
error_detected: Error 429: Rate limit exceeded - retry after 60s
demo_talking_points: Respects API limits - completes without crashing

final_resolution: Buyer matching completed with 4 matches found
Email delivered to corrected address rebecca.stone@charity.org

description: Content generation hits OpenAI rate limit
error_detected: Error 429: Rate limit exceeded on GPT-4
final_resolution: Weekly report generated using fallback LLM

description: Uploaded bank statement is corrupted/unreadable PDF
error_detected: Error: PDF extraction failed - file corrupted
final_resolution: Email sent to buyer requesting re-upload of bank statement

error_detected: Blocked: Attachment rejected by recipient server
final_resolution: MoS delivered via secure download link
demo_talking_points: Multiple delivery methods ensure documents arrive

description: Monitoring service crashes on completion day
final_resolution: Monitoring resumed - no data lost - completion tracked successfully
